external_references.source_name: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022
external_references.description: Unit 42. (2022, February 25). Spear Phishing Attacks Target Organizations in Ukraine, Payloads Include the Document Stealer OutSteel and the Downloader SaintBot. Retrieved June 9, 2022.

objects.description: [Saint Bear](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1031) relies on user interaction and execution of malicious attachments and similar for initial execution on victim systems.(Citation: Palo Alto Unit 42 OutSteel SaintBot February 2022 )
